scripts.eslint: eslint src/js && echo $(tput setaf 2)eslint success$(tput sgr0)
scripts.folder:make: shx mkdir -p dist/client/css dist/client/js dist/client/bundle && shx cp src/*.* dist/client/ && shx cp -r src/static dist/client/
scripts.folder: npm run folder:clean -s && npm run folder:make -s
scripts.plugins:fa: shx mkdir dist/client/css/font-awesome && shx cp -r node_modules/font-awesome/css/ node_modules/font-awesome/fonts/ dist/client/css/font-awesome/
scripts.prejs: babel src/js -d dist/server/ -s inline > dist/tmp.txt && shx rm dist/tmp.txt
scripts.js: browserify src/js/app.js -t [ babelify ] -d | exorcist dist/client/js/app.js.map > dist/client/js/app.js
scripts.postjs: uglifyjs dist/client/js/app.js -m -o dist/client/js/app.min.js --in-source-map dist/client/js/app.js.map --source-map dist/client/js/app.min.js.map --source-map-url app.min.js.map --source-map-root app/js
scripts.build:dev: npm run eslint -s && npm run folder -s && npm run plugins -s && npm run css -s && npm run js -s
scripts.watch:css: chokidar 'src/less' -c 'npm run css && echo $(tput setaf 2)css done$(tput sgr0)'
scripts.watch:js: chokidar 'src/js' -c 'npm run js && echo $(tput setaf 2)js done$(tput sgr0)'
scripts.watch:static: chokidar 'src/*.*' 'src/static' -c 'shx cp -ru src/*.* src/static dist/client/ && echo $(tput setaf 2)static done$(tput sgr0)'
scripts.watch: npm run watch:css -s & npm run watch:js -s & npm run watch:static -s
scripts.dev: npm run build:dev -s && ( npm run watch -s & npm run dev:server -s )
scripts.postbundle:css: shx cat dist/client/tmp/*.css | cleancss -o dist/client/bundle/bundle.min.css --s0 && shx rm -r dist/client/tmp/
scripts.bundle: npm run bundle:css -s && npm run bundle:js -s && npm run bundle:index -s
scripts.build: npm run build:dev -s && npm run bundle -s
scripts.prod: npm run build -s && npm run prod:server -s
scripts.pretest: shx rm -rf test/ && babel src/js -d test/ -s inline > tmp.txt && shx rm tmp.txt
scripts.preclient-test: shx mkdir -p dist/client/test/ && cp node_modules/mocha/mocha.css node_modules/mocha/mocha.js node_modules/chai/chai.js dist/client/test/
scripts.doc: npm run doc:jsdoc & npm run doc:esdoc
